RemediationStrings.Title: Device has a pending reboot to apply updates
RemediationStrings.Description: Your device is noncompliant because it requires a restart to apply updates. Please restart your device to restore compliance.

RemediationStrings.Title: Device has updates pending which are older than 10 days
RemediationStrings.Description: Your device is noncompliant because it has updates pending for more than 10 days. Please check for updates and install them to restore compliance.
